name: Horde Mode
description:
Horde Mode is about fighting zombies as they spawn around in three spawnpoints. There is only one map.

Gameplay:

  • One Map
  • 3 Weapons(Use CTRL to switch)
  • Team members, zombies, and enemys

The Weapons are Pistol, Assault Rifle, Grenade launcher. The Yellow soldiers are team members, the other colored soldiers are enemys.

Controls: w, a, s, and d to move. Left mouse button to fire. Escape to exit the game. Ctrl to swith weapons.

Support this game by rating and leaving suggestions.

Have Fun!
